item.description:
Cherry Mountain lies a few miles west of the Presidential Range in north-central New Hampshire.

The summit of Owls Head (the north peak of Cherry Mountain), elevation 3,263 feet, provides excellent views of the Presidentials, Crawford Notch, and the peaks surrounding Franconia Notch.

Cherry Mountain, consisting of Mount Martha (3573'), Owl's Head (3258')

This is a member lead, a good trek for after a Saturday night camp out or a shorter Sunday hike with a workout.
A moderate hike with a round trip of 5.7 miles, just 2350' elevation gain in a book time of 5 hours.






When and Where: Cherry Mtn parking lot, Hwy 115, Twin Mountain , NH 03595
item.how_to_find_us: Meet each other in the parking lot
item.name: Cherry Mountain, Twin Mountain , NH
